name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Since September, many artists have accused A-soul Comics Studio of long-term exploitation of employees. The studio has produced many best-selling comics and was commissioned to draw the comic version of Douluo Continent.
But there is an unknown side behind the big studio that is loved by comic fans. Since the studio moved into a farm, the artists have been forced to live with hundreds of animals, work up to 16 hours a day, and listen to "positive" music while working. The studio also encourages employees to report each other. Unknowingly, the artists have become one of the many animals in the farm, and have become captive animals...
Many artists who left the farm have lost their ability to speak, schizophrenia, and some even end their lives by lying on the road.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Part II:

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Part VI:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The author "Yuan Shang Bai Yun Jian" was arrested by the authorities for writing a BL novel and uploading it to the Haitang Literature website.
On December 17, the husband of "Yuan Shang Bai Yun Jian" posted on Weibo that he saw his wife in a haggard state during the court hearing in November and was sentenced to 4 years and 6 months in prison by the court. Although he holds the verdict in his hand, "due to special reasons, the verdict cannot be posted online"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 19, the Beijing Daily's Theory One Point program said: "The more socialism develops, the more democracy develops" 
"Deng Xiaoping always follows the will of the people and gathers their wisdom when making decisions and handling problems. He listens to their opinions first and then makes decisions" 
"The will of the people is what the people think, the people's livelihood is how the people live, and democracy is the status of the people" 
"Without democracy, there is no socialism" 
"The more socialism develops, the more democracy develops"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 11, a farmer posted a video accusing the authorities of using his name for false interviews and propaganda.
In June 2023, the authorities released news that the villagers in Huangsang Township, Mayang, "are busy picking peppers, and farmers are smiling with increased income." It also said that the household sold peppers at a price of 5 to 6 yuan per kilogram. They also used the farmer's name to do a false interview, saying that he had 180 acres of land and could earn 400,000 yuan.
In fact, the farmer's peppers were purchased at a price of only 2 yuan at the time, which was a loss, and there was no such a large amount of land.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 19, a netizen in Yucheng County, Shangqiu City, Henan Province complained online that the car repair and car wash shop he operated was fined 1,000 yuan for not registering for car repair business, and the fine was issued by the Transportation Bureau. No electronic ticket was issued on the spot, but a handwritten ticket. The fine was also required to be paid directly to the law enforcement officer by scanning the code.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens added that Tianli School also has multiple scandals.
Graduates revealed that bullying often occurs in the school, not only students bullying students, but also teachers bullying students. Some teachers often use insulting words to scold people, and some teachers will hurt students' self-esteem.
In 2021, the school also had hundreds of students suffering from food poisoning. The principal threatened: "Do you think you are making a big fuss?" It was found that there were hair, even cigarette butts and snails in the canteen food.
There are also netizens in the comment area who reflected: The school also cheated by giving students answers in the state and city unified examinations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, a netizen posted that public officials in Qidong County, Hengyang City, Hunan Province were required to participate in the fundraising activity. The collective donation of each unit must not be less than 3,000 yuan. County-level cadres must not donate less than 500 yuan each; section-level cadres must not donate less than 400 yuan each; other cadres and employees must not donate less than 200 yuan each
The local government denied the claim of compulsory donations: donations are voluntary, you can do it yourself in the unit, this is the work arranged by the county party committee
Local public officials complained: "Why is the donation mandatory? And I don't even know who I donate to."
The online document shows that the objects of the fundraising activity cover units and individuals. Units include county-level administrative and public institutions above the deputy section level, provincial and municipal units stationed in Qi, and townships (streets, management offices). Individuals include all administrative and public institutions above the county-level third-level institutions, provincial and municipal units stationed in Qi, township (streets, management offices) agencies and their financial offices, colleges, hospitals and other units...
fullContent:
12月16日 有网友发帖称，湖南省衡阳市祁东县全县的公职人员被要求参与募捐活动。要求每个单位的集体捐款不得少于3000元。县处级干部每人捐款不得低于500；科级每人不低于400；其他干部职工每人不得低于200
当地政府否认了强制捐款的说法：捐款是自愿的，你在单位你自己看着办喽，这是县委安排的工作
当地公职人员吐槽：“捐款为什么强制？而且我连捐给谁都不知道”。
网传文件显示，该募捐活动的对象涵盖了单位和个人。单位包括县直副科级以上行政事业单位、省市驻祁单位以及各乡镇（街道、管理处）。个人则包括县直三级机构以上行政事业单位、省市驻祁单位、乡镇（街道、管理处）机关及其财政所、学院、医院等单位的所有在职在岗干部职工。离退休干部职工不在捐献之列，但可自愿参与捐赠。该文件还规定了单位和个人的捐款标准，要求每个单位的集体捐款不得少于3000元。个人捐款方面，县处级干部每人不得低于500元；科级干部每人不得低于400元；其他干部职工每人不得低于200元。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 19, the Cyberspace Administration of China issued a document to severely crack down on online violations of the legitimate rights and interests of minors. Among them, posting spoof "sand sculpture animation" short videos was listed as the top problematic behavior that affects the physical and mental health of minors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission December 19th, vendors clashed with police at the gate of Chongqing University of Science and Technology, and a fight broke out. Several policemen held someone by their limbs and carried him into a car. In video 1, it seems that policemen stopped recording.
Informed netizens revealed: vendors originally set up stalls on the right side of the university gate, but today they were asked to draw lots, and then set up stalls in the newly built shed on the left side of the gate, and could no longer set up stalls on the right side. However, the sheds were limited, and only about half of the vendors could draw lots to go to the sheds, so conflicts occurred

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, under a video about the sufferings of the first thirty years after the founding of the People's Republic of China, a domestic software AI automatically generated copywriting appeared to be a tower

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 19, a netizen in Yucheng County, Shangqiu City, Henan Province complained online that the car repair and car wash shop he operated was fined 1,000 yuan for not registering for car repair business, and the fine was issued by the Transportation Bureau. 
No electronic ticket was issued on the spot, but a handwritten ticket. The fine was also required to be paid directly to the law enforcement officer by scanning the code.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A netizen submitted an article. He found that the TP-Link router he recently purchased was blocked by the router when he was preparing to connect to the VPN international network, and the VPN connection was repeatedly disconnected. The router he used at work was also the same model, but it was a product from two or three years ago, and there was no problem using VPN.
Is this a common phenomenon?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 19, the tap water at Baoding Institute of Technology turned yellow, and many students went to the hospital for intravenous drips due to vomiting, diarrhea, and fever.
Some students reported that the school's previous hot water was also yellow and salty. After the water supply was cut off for a week for rectification, the water became even yellower, and the body became particularly itchy after taking a bath.
A large number of videos circulated online claiming that the school's septic tank and drinking water pipes were connected in reverse

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The school admitted that there were indeed students in the hospital, but it was not because the water pipes were connected in reverse: We all asked professionals to connect them, and such low-level mistakes would not happen. The school staff also said: The school will trace who spread the rumors and hold them accountable.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 17, after the Nanchang police dispelled the rumor that Li Yixue was still at home, some brave bloggers went to Li Yixue's home to look for her, but they found that the house was empty, and the surveillance camera at the door was making sounds.
There was also a blogger who came from another place and received a "police call" as soon as he arrived. He did not dare to mention the word police and could only make gestures. He also said that he was not optimistic now and wanted to speak but could not send anything.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 20, Xiaohongshu’s account blocking became a hot topic on Weibo, and some netizens reported that their Xiaohongshu accounts were also blocked. Xiaohongshu said: In the past month, a total of 1,259,709 accounts were blocked, all of which were black and gray industry accounts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution October 21 Hubei University of Arts and Sciences Because the parents joined the political group chat of the Chinese Voters' Deliberation Group, the school tricked the child into going to the office under the pretext of asking the student to recite a question. The student was then surrounded by six people, who asked him to make a video call to the parents and asked the parents to quit the political group chat.
The video call was recorded by the parents in its entirety.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Shandong Tengzhou Senior Experimental High School, informed student submission:
The previous online news was inaccurate. In fact, the school had three suicides in one year, not four.
The teacher Meng Wei in Figures 1 and 2 was the one who kicked the student's body four times after the student jumped off the building and said, "Don't pretend to be dead, it's really unlucky."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 18, a Chinese soldier who joined the Russian army complained that the food was too bad and that the food he ate was like pig food: "These meals look like pig food. We are going to file a complaint with the United Nations if we feed the soldiers pig food." "The food during World War II wasn't this bad! You can't get better even if you eat this every day for 20 years!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Ukrainians dropped leaflets to North Korean soldiers in Kursk, which read: Surrender today and you will reach South Korea tomorrow.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 19, Benxi, Liaoning. Parents exposed that the Wulidian School cafeteria fed children leftovers poured into dog food bags.
Parents said they had watched the surveillance video and found that the food in the bag was originally intended to feed the dogs. Later, the cafeteria found that there was not enough food, so they poured it out for the students to eat. There were also tooth marks and rice grains on the food.
Furious parents came to the school to ask for an explanation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 19, Putin said in a "live broadcast" and a large annual press conference: Foreign companies' withdrawal from Russia has promoted the development of Russian business.
Professor Zhang Weiwei of Fudan University has also expressed a similar view: The US government wants foreign capital to move out of China, which is an opportunity that has not been seen in a century for us.
Netizens joked that "infringement of Zhang Weiwei's intellectual property rights"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a Chinese student posted a video saying: Many people imagine Japan to be very beautiful, but I can't finish complaining about Japan's shortcomings in a day.
For example: You can't smoke in public places, and you will be fined 2,000 yen if you are caught.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 19, Shanghai. An anesthesiologist posted that he was "caught back" to work overtime when he was about to get off work, so he deliberately gave the patient less anesthetic to make him feel pain.
A colleague in the comment area said, "Pain makes people wake up quickly, and waking up slowly affects my ability to get off work."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on December 20, two Chinese men traveled between Tokyo and Shizuoka in one year, stealing high-end sports bicycles. They transferred more than 200 bicycles worth about 13 million yen to Cambodia for sale. 
Currently, the two have been arrested by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A public institution in Tianjin recruited an undergraduate student to "dig out manure" and more than 300 people signed up.
"More than 300 people signed up to dig out manure?" Recently, in the open recruitment of the drainage management office of the public institution in Heping District, Tianjin, there is a position that requires undergraduates to participate in the digging and maintenance of manure and oil pollution.
Currently, 326 people have signed up for this position, and 248 people have passed the review. Netizens replied "The life of a manure bucket"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 18, Guangdong. A man introduced the factory's piecework system to a customer: We use the standard work piecework model. No matter how many minutes it takes for an employee to finish a task, it is set to 10 minutes. If an employee works too fast, the standard work will be adjusted. In other words, if an employee works too fast and has high production capacity, he will be paid according to the hourly wage. If he works too little, he will be paid by piecework.
Netizens responded: "This boss should be shot"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 19, Dalian, Liaoning. Mr. Li went to the Gangdian Branch of the Market Supervision Administration to do some business. At about 11:15 a.m. that day, he arrived at the scene and found that no one was working.
Then, he went to another nearby Market Supervision Administration. The time was 11:28, but the employees were already queuing up in the cafeteria to get food.
Municipal Supervision: His mobile phone time was not accurate and "advanced"
But the wall clock in the video showed that the time was about 11:30.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 19 (Released) A video about "a day of Chinese employees working in a Japanese bento factory" circulated on the Internet.
The video shows that when the employees poured seasoning on the bento, the narrator of the video said "Why not give the Japanese some medicine?"
In addition, the video also shows a female employee taking off her mask and secretly eating fried chicken.
Since the factory is suspected to be located in Sendai City, the local government said: It is currently confirming whether the factory complies with the hygiene management rules.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 19, Song Erwei, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, gave a speech at Tsinghua University. During the speech, students asked sharp questions such as "What do you think about the collective cancer incident among doctoral students at Sun Yat-sen University?" One of the students asked what he thought about the fact that Academician Song Erwei's son published an article as an author in a journal during high school. The host on the side interrupted him hastily. It was reported online that some students tore up the posters for the lecture to vent their anger.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 20, Suzhou, Jiangsu. A woman posted that after school, she rode an electric bike to a roadside stall outside the school gate to buy food. Because the stall was only about 100 meters away from the school, she did not wear a helmet, and was stopped by a traffic policeman and fined.
But at this time, there were other people riding by without helmets on the roadside, but the traffic police did not fine them. She questioned the traffic police's selective law enforcement.
After the woman posted this incident online, the post was deleted by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens said that Academician Song Erwei responded to the cancer incident by saying, "There are not three students with cancer, but two, and it has nothing to do with the laboratory. The cancer is due to family history."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Shanghai, a man posted a video saying that his company had a project developed jointly with South Korea. Due to the heavy workload, he sent a message to his colleagues saying that they needed to work overtime, but the South Korean company replied that they would not work overtime on Friday.
The man said, "Can you understand how much of a blow I feel? South Korea doesn't even need to work overtime."
Many netizens also expressed envy in the comment section. One netizen replied, "How much do the people who won first have to win before they can lead us to win later?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The public account "Aquarius Era" disclosed that Anhui police arrested more than 50 authors of Haitang Literature City across provinces for suspected profiteering from the production of obscene materials.
On December 17, the top author "Yunjian" was sentenced to four years and six months in prison for actively returning the stolen money; another author "Yixie" was sentenced to one year and five months, suspended for two years; some authors who failed to raise funds to return the stolen money, such as "Cijiu", were sentenced to five years and six months in prison.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The employees of Jiyue Automobile wrote their names on the wall which reads "Every Jiyue person's name will be in the history of China's smart cars."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 20, a delivery man was stopped by traffic police and fell off his bike. Looking at the delivery box that fell on the ground, the man lost control of his emotions and a fight broke out between the two sides. Passersby stepped forward to try to stop them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 20, Beijing Youth Daily: The Beijing Declaration provides the world with a Chinese solution.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I really want to know why OKX, as a world-leading digital currency trading platform, would mark a project launched fairly on @pumpdotfun as a Pixiu disk and block it. The projects launched on Pumpfun are all consistent in architecture. If OKX thinks $LI is a Pixiu disk, then are the many projects you have launched based on Pumpfun Pixiu disks?
If OKX can block a blockchain project at will, does this mean that you also have the authority to dispose of users' assets at will?
I hope you can give your reasons.
@star_okx @okx @wallet

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"The video is gone"
On December 19, the stage play "Happiness is gone" was circulated on the Internet. The play tells the story of China's current downward environment: "The real estate market has collapsed, foreign investors have withdrawn, the middle class has become rich, students have become emo, psychiatric departments are full, and Huawei is far ahead."
Currently, the video has been deleted on various platforms.
Netizens replied "One more sentence: The video is gone" "How is this completely opposite to Huang Bo's song?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to recent media reports, the National Medical Insurance Administration has guided the Hubei Provincial Medical Insurance Administration to lead the national alliance procurement of Chinese patent medicines.
There are many Chinese medicine injections in the list of this round of procurement. This means that the collection of Chinese patent medicines has expanded from mainly oral Chinese patent medicines to both oral and injection.
Netizens replied, "Sun Simiao would never have thought that injections could be used"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 19, Nanchang, Jiangxi. An enthusiastic citizen posted a message in the group, saying that he would "gather a group of people to get Li Yixue back." Later, the citizen received a call from the police, who asked him not to incite or organize many people to go to Li Yixue's home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 19, Teng County, Guangxi. A blind old man lived in a dilapidated house and was still barefoot in the cold winter. This scene touched many netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 19, Song Erwei, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, gave a speech at Tsinghua University. During the speech, students asked pointed questions such as "What do you think about the incident of a group of doctoral students at Sun Yat-sen University suffering from cancer?" One of the students asked what he thought about Academician Song Erwei's son Su Shicheng publishing an article as an author in a journal during high school. The host interrupted him hastily. It was reported online that some students tore up the posters for the lecture to vent their anger.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 20, a delivery man was stopped by a traffic policeman and fell off his bike. Looking at the delivery box that fell on the ground, the man broke down and pushed the traffic policeman to the ground. Passersby stepped forward to dissuade him.
